about.description: {{brandType}} allows users to maintain their portfolio of applications with a full set of metadata and to assess their suitability for modernization leveraging a questionnaire based approach.
about.iconLibrary: The Icon Library used in this project is a derivative of the <2>Standard Icons library</2> by <5>Red Hat</5>, used under <8>CC BY 4.0</8>
about.introduction: {{brandType}} is a collection of tools that supports large-scale application modernization and migration projects to Kubernetes.

actions.clearRepositoryNotSupported: This action is disabled when RWX volumes are not available

composed.noDataStateBody: Create a new {{what}} to start seeing data here.

message.applicationsBulkDelete: The selected application(s) will be deleted.
message.discardAssessment: The assessment for <1>{{applicationName}}</1> will be discarded, as well as the review result. Do you wish to continue?
message.leavePage: Are you sure you want to leave this page? Be sure to save your changes, or they will be lost.
message.refreshPage: Try to refresh your page or contact your admin.
message.maxfileSize: Max file size of 1MB exceeded. Upload a smaller file.
message.dragAndDropFile: Drag and drop your file here or upload one.
message.deleteQuestionnaire: Deleting a questionnaire will cascade into the deletion of all answered questionnaires associated to applications and/or archetypes.

message.archetypeNoApplications: No applications currently match the criteria tags.
message.appNotAssessedBody: In order to review an application it must be assessed first. Assess the application and try again.
message.assessmentStakeholderHeader: Select the stakeholder(s) or stakeholder group(s) associated with this assessment.
message.binaryPackaging: Packaging will default to JAR if left empty.
message.copyAssessmentAndReviewBody: Some of the selected target applications have an in-progress or complete assessment/review. By continuing, the existing assessment(s)/review(s) will be replaced by the copied assessment/review. Do you wish to continue?
message.copyAssessmentBody: Some of the selected target applications have an in-progress or complete assessment. By continuing, the existing assessment(s) will be replaced by the copied assessment. Do you wish to continue?
message.couldNotFetchBody: Resource doesn't exists or you don't have access to it
message.duplicateTag: A tag with this name already exists. Use a different name.
message.duplicateWave: The migration wave could not be created due to a conflict with an existing wave. Make sure the name and start/end dates are unique and try again.
message.importErrorCheckDocumentation: For status Error imports, check the documentation to ensure your file is structured correctly.
message.insecureTracker: Insecure mode deactivates certificate verification. Use insecure mode for instances that have self-signed certificates.
message.manageDependenciesInstructions: Add northbound and southbound dependencies for the selected application here. Note that any selections made will be saved automatically. To undo any changes, you must manually delete the applications from the dropdowns.
message.noDataAvailableBody: No data available to be shown here.
message.noResultsFoundBody: No results match the filter criteria. Remove all filters or clear all filters to show results.
message.overrideAssessmentDescription: The application {{name}} already is associated with archetypes: {{what}}.
message.overrideAssessmentConfirmation: Do you want to create a dedicated assessment for this application and override the inherited archetype assessment(s)?
message.overrideReviewConfirmation: This application has already been reviewed. Do you want to continue?
message.overrideArchetypeReviewConfirmation: This archetype has already been reviewed. Do you want to continue?
message.reasonForError: The reported reason for the error:
message.reviewInstructions: Use this section to provide your assessment of the possible migration/modernization plan and effort estimation.
message.selectedBecauseArchetypeTags: Selected because the archetype's tags include {{tags}}
message.selectedBecauseAppOrArchetypeTags: Selected because the application or archetype's tags include {{tags}}
message.selectOwnerFromStakeholdersList: Select owner from list of stakeholders
message.suggestedAdoptionPlanHelpText: The suggested approach to migration based on effort, priority, and dependencies.
message.taskInProgressForTags: A new analysis is in-progress.  Tags may be updated upon completion.
message.toTagApplication: Either no tags exist yet or you may not have permission to view any. If you have permission, try creating a new custom tag.

terms.customTargetsDetails: Create and manage custom migration targets. You can also drag and drop the cards to rearrange them. Note that any changes to the layout here will be reflected in the Analysis wizard
terms.reportDownloadSetting: Allow reports to be downloaded after running an analysis.
terms.impactfulButNotAdvisableToMove: Impactful but not advisable to move
terms.label: Label
terms.name: Name
terms.question: Question
terms.rejectedAppsAndDeps: Rejected applications and dependencies or unknown records
terms.settingsAllowApps: Allow reviewing applications without running an assessment first

success.assessmentAndReviewCopied: Success! Assessment and review copied to selected applications
success.assessmentCopied: Success! Assessment copied to selected applications
success.fileSavedToBeProcessed: Success! file saved to be processed.

validation.email: This field requires a valid email.
validation.max: This field must be less than {{value}}.
validation.maxLength: This field must contain fewer than {{length}} characters.
validation.min: This field must be greater than {{value}}.
validation.minLength: This field must contain at least {{length}} characters.
validation.minOneStakeholderOrGroupRequired: At least one stakeholder or stakeholder groups is required.

label.customRules: Include rules for the analysis by uploading or importing from a repository.
label.notAllAnalyzableDetails: Some of the selected applications cannot be analyzed with the selected source because those values have not been defined. By continuing, these applications won't be included in the analysis.
label.skipTargets: Target selection can be skipped if custom rules file(s) are used
label.ruleFileRequiredDetails: At least one custom rule file is required if no targets are selected.
label.reviewDetails: Review the information below, then run the analysis.
label.scope: Select the scope of dependencies you want to include in the analysis.
label.scopeAllDeps: Application and all dependencies, including known Open Source libraries
label.scopeSelectDeps: Add the list of packages to be analyzed
label.setTargets: Select one or more target options in focus for the analysis.
